description: An indepth view at each indivudial node

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r) =>
    r._measurement == "node" and 
    r._field == "status_ok" and
    r.name == "${node}" and
    r.network == "${network}"
  )
  |> yield()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r) =>
    r._measurement == "node" and 
    r._field == "response_result_data_Pool_info_Read_only" and
    r.name == "${node}" and
    r.network == "${network}"
  )
  |> yield()
